TextView.android:text:
You can send and receive message using flash light and camera with this app.
It could help you to communicate with others where mobile phone signal is off line due to disaster or other reason.
This program convert text to morse code and transmit it through LED flash or LCD display. Also it receive morse code through camera and interpret it.
The main purpose of this application is helping people who meet with a disaster to send emergency message
Support Language: English only
This program manipulates the camera LED on the phones.
